DataElement.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 50000 Recovery Occurrence Date Validation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date validation response of the first platelet count greater than or equal to at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter that occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 50000 Recovery Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: If necessary, please validate
ReferenceDocuments.description: If necessary, please validate the date of platelets greater than or equal to 50 x 10E9/L response.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2775863
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedObservation.dateRangeValidationCode WHERE PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "perform platelet count" AND PerformedObservation > PerformedClinicalResult.value IS GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO "50 x 10E9/L"
